name: Us, from a cat's perspective
description:
"Us" is a game in which you play as different cats that go through situations that expose human nature at its worst.

It is an entertaining way to shine a light on modern society's many flaws, mainly the excessive use of the cellphone and lack of interpersonal interactions.

The game is still under development, however, i wanted to upload the second chapter nonetheless to see some opinions on it. (Each chapter is a stand alone adventure)

Download it and let me know what you think!
